sections.MISSION:
Bull Troop conducts M249 qualification training at Range 102 NLT 10-11JAN23 IOT qualify Soldiers on individual weapons systems.
Leader’s
sections.PURPOSE: Ensure Bull Troop SMs are fundamentally sound on all levels on marksmanship IOT prepare for upcoming training events and maintain lethality within Bull Troop.
sections.EXECUTION:
}:
Zero all M249s
Engage Targets with an M249 Qualify all shooters on M249 IAW TC 3-22.4
Correct Malfunctions of an M249
Target Transitions/ Movement
Ammo Belt Changes
sections.END STATE:
/Training Outcomes:
All Soldiers are safely Qualified on M249.
Concept of the Operation: All will draw their respective weapons systems at their Troops.
SMs will link-up at the Troop AO for transportation to Range 102.
SMs will SP to Range 102.
Range set- up tutorial, OIC & RSO brief
SMs will begin training once range is live and ammo has been dropped off.
SMs will conduct M249 qualification at Range 102 IAW TC 3-22.40.
Safety: All Soldiers will validate a zeroed weapon before the qualification
1x lane safety will be present for each 2x Soldiers on the range
Resourcing
Troops to Task/ Bull Resources
OIC (1LT Leth), RSO (SFC Czwartacky)
Ammo NCO, 2x PAX
16x range safeties
2x gate guards
Land: Range 102
Trans: B TRP Strykers for backside support PLT Transportation
Medic: B TRP Medics, CASEVAC on site
CBRN Chamber
